abstract.t: The Simple Service Location Protocol (SSLP) provides a framework forthe discovery and selection of the services working on 6LoWPAN. Theprotocol has a simple structure that is easy to be implemented on6LoWPAN devices that are characterized by short range, low bit rateand low power. The protocol also offers a mechanism forinteroperability with the IP networks under SLP. It enablescommunication between 6LoWPAN and other IP networks.
